Azumarill (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0183: Marill
Pokémon
#0185: Sudowoodo →
For Pokémon TCG Pocket cards, see Azumarill (TCG Pocket).

Azumarill has been featured on 21 different cards since it debuted in the Neo Genesis expansion of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Azumarill cards are normally Water-type or Psychic-type Stage 1 Pokémon.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Azumarill

Azumarill
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
